GSD.description:
iommu/arm-smmu-v3: fix event handling soft lockup

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.3 by commit b2c6557c2f4ea9a5b1a0d4f31679d8ed92eae006. For more details please see the references link.
